title: Isle Royale National Park: Houghton
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Houghton              Houghton         The Houghton Visitor Center, with the Ranger III park ferry in the background, in winter.       Houghton, Michigan is Isle Royale National Park's mainland headquarters.  It is located along the Portage Canal in Houghton.  Use this map to help you locate the headquarters.  The address is:  800 E. Lakeshore Drive, Houghton, MI 49931.        There is a visitor center, as well as administrative offices, at the headquarters.  The visitor center is open year-round, with the exception of fall and winter federal holidays.  Get up-to-date operating hours prior to your visit.  Houghton is the home port for the park ferry, Ranger III.  Private boaters can get their permit at the visitor center for their visit prior to heading out to the island.  Interagency passes can also be purchased or obtained from the visitor center.
